content: amigurumi pattern for elfilin from kirby and the forgotten land materials worsted weight yarn 4 medium in the following colors - aqua - pink i used a crochet hook size f-3 75mm you ll also need some things to make the facial features such as yarn shown above or felt a tapestry needle and some fiber fill is also needed i didn t have plastic pellets while i made this but try putting some on his bottom feet and tail for extra stability and tell me how it went abbreviations single_crochet= single_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet tc= triple crochet st= stitch slip_stitch= slip_stitch increase= increase work two single_crochet into one st dcinc= work two double_crochet into one st tcinc= work two tc into one st decrease= decrease chain= chain all phrases in parentheses are repeated until the end of the round tips - use scrap yarn as a stitch marker - when single-crocheting several rounds an unsightly seam will form where you put slip stitches this is where the scrap yarn stitch marker helps as it weaves in and out where the rounds started in case you need to unravel of course you don t have to sew the appendages on the way i did you can make it like the one shown in the picture below as a christmas ornament or something omit the plastic pellets if you re doing this procedure body 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 slip_stitch together 2 increase entire round 3 15 single_crochet 2 decrease slip_stitch 16 single_crochet entire round 17 single_crochet 2 increase 1 slip_stitch 18 single_crochet 3 increase 1 slip_stitch 19-23 single_crochet next 5 rounds 24 single_crochet 3 decrease 1 slip_stitch 25 single_crochet 2 decrease 1 slip_stitch 26 single_crochet 1 decrease 1 slip_stitch and finish the ears were probably the most challenging part of the pattern for me it is done in two separate pieces i realized using slip stitches to attach the pink pieces to the aqua ones will give it a neat look the blue part of the ears make two 1 chain 4 2 chain 1
